titles.title: Guarding Readiness Resources Act of 2021
A bill to provide for the crediting of funds received by the National Guard Bureau as reimbursement from States.
Guarding Readiness Resources Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Guarding Readiness Resources Act of 2021
This bill modifies the treatment of funds received by the National Guard Bureau as a reimbursement from a state or other U.S. territory (e.g., Guam) for the use of military property.
Specifically, the funds must be credited to (1) the appropriation, fund, or account used in incurring the obligation; or (2) an appropriation, fund, or account currently available for the purposes of which the expenditures were made.
